thread.title: Windows 10 devices likely to be launched today
thread.title_full: Windows 10 devices likely to be launched today

title: Windows 10 devices likely to be launched today
text:
Windows 10 devices expected to be launched today BT Online New Delhi Last Updated: October 6, 2015 | 00:00 IST The event is likely to see news about Lumia phones, tablets, its fitness Band, and Xbox One. (Photo: Reuters) 
With the Microsoft Windows 10 event about to be held later on Tuesday, here is a preview as to what you can expect from it. 
"On Tuesday, make sure you tune in to see news about Windows 10 devices from Microsoft . You can watch live - online or on your Xbox," a Windows blog read. 
The event to be held in New York may see launch of some Windows 10 devices. It is likely to see news about Lumia phones, tablets, its fitness Band, and Xbox One. 
Here are the devices expected to be launched in Tuesday's event: Microsoft Lumia 950 XL likely specifications: 5.7" display with QHD resolution (1,440 x 2,560px) 20MP camera with tri-LED flash. 5MP selfie camera Chipset Snapdragon 810 USB Type-C cable that will let the handset to run a desktop Microsoft Lumia 950 likely specifications: 5.2" display with QHD resolution. Chipset Snapdragon 808 Microsoft Lumia 550 likely specifications: 4.7" or a 5" AMOLED or qHD display with 720p resolution. 5MP on the back, 2MP on the front Snapdragon 210 with 1GB of RAM Microsoft Lumia 750 and Lumia 850 likely specifications: 5" screens with about 720p resolution Snapdragon 410 chipset with 1GB of RAM Upgrade to Microsoft Surface Pro 4
